hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Shortcut Room Hammer Wonderitem 2

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #6# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #time#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Dead Hand surrounded by Bomb Flowers# guards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Bomb Flower Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.
